attributes.action: tighten the laws regarding the control of poisonous weeds, namely ragwort, in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ragwort is a menace endangering the lives of hundreds of horses each year and recent research confirms it is also a danger to humans. There are currently no laws in place to enforce the control of this, and other, poisonous weeds. We would ask the Prime Minister to look into this matter, making it possible for landowners to be fined for allowing ragwort to continue spreading and to be found liable if an animal dies as a result of ingesting ragwort on their land.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "tighten the laws regarding the control of poisonous weeds, namely ragwort, in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
